definition.text: The Inside Bars indicator makes use of the pattern that the current candle is enveloped by the previous bar, and has the potential to break out from here, especially when there are two signals that follow each other.

paragraphs.text: When the indicator detects a candle that is "inside" of the previous one, an arrow is produced, with the colour depending on the direction of the current candle; Green for upward, and red for downward.
There are no modifiable parameters for this indicator.

| Product Setting | Product Variable | Properties |
| InsideBars | ib | value, double |
